compliant.section: The Personal Information that we collect from you may be stored and processed in your region, or transferred to, stored at or otherwise processed outside your region, including but not limited to Taiwan, Japan or in any other country and where NUVOTON and NTCJ or their Affiliates, subsidiaries or service providers maintain facilities.
compliant.legal provisions: GDPR Chapter V - Transfers of personal data to third countries or international organisations

compliant.section: Where we transfer your Personal Information outside your region, we will ensure that suitable safeguards such as appropriate agreements and mechanisms are in place to help ensure that our third party service providers provide an adequate level of protection to your Personal Information.

non_compliant.section: including but not limited to Taiwan, Japan or in any other country
non_compliant.legal provisions: Transfers on the basis of an adequacy decision
non_compliant.amend: Specify countries deemed adequate by the European Commission or provide specific safeguards for each mentioned country.
